title: I need helps!
body: I live in Indonesia and i used to play in NA server which has like around 250ms. So i transfer my account into OCE server because OCE server would have lower ping than NA. BUT i have like 340ms in OCE server what the hell. Can anyone help me why is it happening and solution for it?

replies.body: You have high ping because NA and OCE aren't supposed to cater for Indonesian players. The server for Indonesian players is the [ID  server](https://lol.garena.co.id/). Sadly it's hosted by Garena which means you can't transfer your account there. You will need to create a new account if you want to play on ID.

I already have 3 ID server account and i played it like 1 and a half year. I miss server that uses english, but i can adapt 260ms in NA server so i transfered my NA account to OCE. I am wondering why is the ping so high even it shouldn't and i am finding for a solution because i spent so many monies and it's so pity to not use it... I really miss using english ingame. Thank you!
Have you tried playing on the SG (Singapore) Garena server? I hear it's almost only English speakers and you'll have much better ping there.
Oh forgot SG server. Thanks for feedback!
